## Frequently  
Asked Questions

### How do Small Team and Enterprise plans differ?

Users on the Small Team plan can use all current features of Writesonic like
Chatsonic, AI Article Writers, Article Rewriter, Instant Article Writer, Fb ad
copy, Instagram caption generator, Sonic Editor, and more.

However, the enterprise plan allows you to customize the number of words and
users. In addition to that, it gives you SSO/SAML login, an invoicing option,
provides you with a dedicated accounts manager, and you also get access to
training sessions and premium support.

If you are on the Small Team plan and feel the need for additional features as
mentioned, you can switch to the enterprise plan anytime. Simply reach out to
our sales team at sales@writesonic.com.

### What are the various pricing options Writesonic offers?

  1. Free: Offers 10,000 free words upon signing up.
  2. Freelancer: Enjoy unlimited generations at just $16/month (if paid annually) and $20/month (if paid monthly).
  3. Small Team plan: Starts from $33/month for 400,000 words that refresh every month. Get GPT-4 and GPT-4-32K and access to our other exclusive features like the AI Article Writer 5.0, Brand Voices, higher quality image generation and more.
  4. Enterprise plan - If you need more user seats or words and enterprise features like SSO/SAML login, SOC2 and GDPR compliance, dedicated account manager, and training sessions, contact our sales team for a customized plan (sales@writesonic.com).

### How many team members can I add to my account and what is its procedure?

For the following Pricing plans, you can add these number of users -

Small Team $49, $99/month plans - Up to 3 users are allowed

Small Team $199 plan - Up to 4 users are allowed

Small Team $499/month - Up to 5 users are allowed

Enterprise plan: Reach out to our sales team.

### Is Audiosonic included in the paid plans of Writesonic?

Audiosonic is not included as part of Writesonic's paid subscription plans. It
operates on a separate, pay-as-you-go pricing model. This allows you to
purchase audio generation minutes according to your specific needs, without
bundling it into a subscription.

  1. $10 for 40 minutes: Ideal for short projects or initial testing.
  2. $25 for 100 minutes: Suitable for medium-length audio content needs.
  3. $50 for 200 minutes: A cost-effective choice for larger projects.
  4. $100 for 400 minutes: Best value for extensive audio generation requirements.

By offering Audiosonic separately, we give you the flexibility to choose just
the services you need, whether that's content creation, image generation, AI
chatbot development, or audio production.

### Is Botsonic included in the paid plans of Writesonic?

Botsonic was initially part of Writesonic's subscription plans but has since
been transitioned to its own standalone platform. This move was driven by the
significant interest in Botsonic's capabilities, prompting us to redesign and
rebuild the platform from the ground up.

The new architecture focuses on exceptional performance, seamless AI
workflows, scalability, and reliability, offering a robust and efficient user
experience.

Botsonic now has its own pricing model, separate from Writesonic. You can view
the pricing details at Botsonic Pricing. Plans for Botsonic start at
$49/month.

### I have exhausted my words before the start of the next billing month. How
can I get more?

If your words are exhausted during the month, you can upgrade to the next
higher plan, and only the pro-rated difference will be charged based on the
remaining days in the billing cycle. If you need fewer words next month, you
can again downgrade your plan and be charged accordingly.

### Is there any pay-as-you-go plan?

No. Currently, pay-as-you-go plans are available only for Audiosonic.

### If I subscribe to a monthly plan, will I be charged automatically next
month?

Yes, monthly subscription plans charge you automatically every month until you
cancel or pause them.

### What are the payment methods supported by Writesonic? Is it possible to
pay through PayPal as well?

Writesonic currently accepts debit/credit cards as well as PayPal as payment
methods. In countries where our users are more concentrated, we plan to
gradually add additional payment gateways. Users will be charged in their
local currency for these additional payment methods.

### How do the various quality options differ?

At Writesonic, we understand that every content requirement is unique. That's
why we offer two quality options to generate content based on your quantity
and quality needs.

Our Premium quality option runs on GPT-3.5 and our custom-trained models,
ensuring top-notch content output. For even higher quality, our Superior
quality option runs on GPT-4 and our other custom models.

Premium quality offers 6x more content than Superior quality. So with higher-
quality models, the quantity will decrease. But the higher the model, the
higher the quality and length of the outputs generated.

However, for the best quality content, we recommend using the Superior
quality, where our largest model trained on billions of parameters runs. It
understands your context and generates intelligent content, and the output
length is 6000 words at a time against the output length of 3000 words in the
Premium model.

But if you require faster content generation with reasonably good quality,
then the Premium option is ideal for you.

on current events and trending topics effortlessly.

extracts key info and crafts content from your important documents.

art for social media posts and digital campaigns.

research, PR, and beyond.

## Build no-code AI chatbots

on your own data with Botsonic

Train ChatGPT on your own data and build smarter AI chatbots for your website.
Make customer interactions your strong suit using Botsonic.

Get Started Free

Previous

### Data-driven Customization

Upload sitemaps, files, and URLs to train ChatGPT on your unique data,
enabling this AI chatbot to assist customers with personalized responses.

### Chatbot Personalization

Customize your AI chatbot with logos, colors, and messages for a cohesive
brand experience. Set starter questions and guidelines for a truly consistent
experience.

### No-code Integration

Easily set up Botsonic with no-code; embed on your site or integrate via API
for a seamless experience.

### Multilingual Support

Reach a global audience with Botsonic's support for up to 30 languages,
offering multilingual capabilities.

### Privacy Management

Prioritize customer privacy and securely capture leads with Botsonic's
guaranteed secure environment.
